data.text: @YouGov The definitely would nots presumably still back this corrupt, murderous, profiteering, law-breaking, ministerial code breaking, lying, protest suppressing proto-fascist Conservatives.

@YouGov Thanks, UK government. 

Now my vulnerable partner and I will be running absoluteky fucking BLIND when we try and engage with society. You all don't give a shit.
@YouGov Good. The number of "cases" will drop dramatically.

@YouGov No shit Sherlock.

Did you seriously have to spend public money on such a pointless survey with a blindingly obvious answer?

78% of Britons say they'd still self-isolate if they tested positive for Covid. How this varies by age:

18-24 yr olds: 69%
25-49: 71%
50-64: 82%
65+: 91%

https://t.co/1NDYPBvSKe https://t.co/LF1Eheo7n2
